item.description:
Hi Everyone,

I hope your 2013 is off to a good start.

In the past we usually had our end of year celebration at the end of the year. This time we decided to try having it in the new year.

Join us at Plan B Burger for a fun Social evening of dinner and discussion. At this point I will limit the R.S.V.P for this to 15 for now. Depending on interest and Plan B's ability to host everyone we can up the R.S.V.P by mid month.

Hope you can all make it.
item.name: 2012-2013 Celebration!
